title: Bug 17826[Wizards] New folder wizard is very large if you are creating the folder in a container with a very long path
SR: Bug 17826[Wizards] New folder wizard is very large if you are creating the folder in a container with a very long path F11) Create a folder with a very long name2) Select the folder and open the new folder wizard, it is very wide.Similar with new fileThe Java creation wizards do not have this problem.
